name: Rougelike Game 5000
description:
Quick paced action packed game made in 37 hours for The Yogscast Game Jam 2019 with the theme "giving". I struggled to come up with an idea but I came up with a wonderful quote,

"Give the best gift you can, the sweet release of death - to the dead!"

As I wanted to keep the scope small as I was working solo, I made sure not to over engineer any aspect and ensure what I did create was solid and bug-free. The worse probably would be sometimes you can get a small map... but that's a feature? Right?

I used the Love2D engine as I thought it's super suitable for a gamejam as its easy to pull things together as it's in Lua. I created most of the assets, however I did use some of kenny.nl's
